main event: Multiple civilians observed a round object with lights that appeared to hover, circle, and then rapidly climb out of sight in Bossier City, Louisiana on April 8, 1966.
interesting points: The object appeared to have an orange/red light that would brighten and dim repeatedly.
The object left a trail or exhaust that appeared to be fluid-like in nature.
The object was initially observed low in the east, and upon disappearing, climbed to the northeast at a 60-90 degree angle.
The observer used 10x50 binoculars to view the object.
